moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: Parte ${orderPart.orderPartSeqId} no tiene proveedor
Parte ${orderPart.orderPartSeqId} no tiene cliente
Cliente ${firstOrderPart.customerPartyId} es cliente nuevo
Parte ${orderPart.orderPartSeqId} no tiene dirección de despacho

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: Part ${orderPart.orderPartSeqId} shipping address ${orderPart.postalContactMechId} has trust level of ${trustLevelEnum.description}
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: Parte ${orderPart.orderPartSeqId} dirección de despacho ${orderPart.postalContactMechId} tiene nivel de confianza ${trustLevelEnum.description}

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: Parte ${orderPart.orderPartSeqId} total ${ec.l10n.format(orderPart.partTotal, "#,##0.00")} is greater than ${ec.l10n.format(partMaxTotal, "#,##0.00")}, the average of other order parts plus 3 standard deviations
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: Parte ${orderPart.orderPartSeqId} total ${ec.l10n.format(orderPart.partTotal, "#,##0.00")} es mayor que ${ec.l10n.format(partMaxTotal, "#,##0.00")}, el promedio de otras partes más 3 desviaciones standard

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: Item ${orderItem.orderItemSeqId} product ${productId} quantity ${ec.l10n.format(orderItem.quantity, "0.##")} is greater than ${ec.l10n.format(quantityMax, "#,##0.##")}, the average of previously ordered quantities plus 3 standard deviations
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: Item ${orderItem.orderItemSeqId} producto ${productId} cantidad ${ec.l10n.format(orderItem.quantity, "0.##")} es mayor que ${ec.l10n.format(quantityMax, "#,##0.##")}, el promedio de cantidades anteriores más 3 desviaciones standard

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: Item ${orderItemSeqId} asset ${assetRes.assetId} has ${ec.l10n.format(assetRes.quantityNotAvailable, "0.##")} of ${ec.l10n.format(assetRes.quantity, "0.##")} not available
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: Item ${orderItemSeqId} activo ${assetRes.assetId} tiene ${ec.l10n.format(assetRes.quantityNotAvailable, "0.##")} de ${ec.l10n.format(assetRes.quantity, "0.##")} no disponibles

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: Item ${orderItemSeqId} has inventory in more than one lot: ${lotIdSet}
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: Item ${orderItemSeqId} tiene inventario en más de un lote: ${lotIdSet}

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: In item ${orderItem.orderItemSeqId} oldest lot ${ec.l10n.format(oldestLotExpire, "yyyy-MM-dd")} older than last lot expire ${ec.l10n.format(newerThanExpireDate, "yyyy-MM-dd")}
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: En item ${orderItem.orderItemSeqId} lote más antiguo ${ec.l10n.format(oldestLotExpire, "yyyy-MM-dd")} es más antiguo que expiración de último lote ${ec.l10n.format(newerThanExpireDate, "yyyy-MM-dd")}

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: Item ${orderItem.orderItemSeqId} has ${ec.l10n.format(quantity, "0.##")} which is greater than ${percentOfAvailable}% of available inventory (${ec.l10n.format(curLimit, "0.##")})
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: Item ${orderItem.orderItemSeqId} tiene ${ec.l10n.format(quantity, "0.##")} que es mayor que ${percentOfAvailable}% del inventario disponible (${ec.l10n.format(curLimit, "0.##")})

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: Item ${orderItem.orderItemSeqId} price ${ec.l10n.format(unitAmount, "0.00")} is less than minimum price ${ec.l10n.format(minPrice, "0.00")} for product ${orderItem.productId}
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: Item ${orderItem.orderItemSeqId} precio ${ec.l10n.format(unitAmount, "0.00")} es menor que el precio mínimo ${ec.l10n.format(minPrice, "0.00")} para producto ${orderItem.productId}

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: Item ${orderItem.orderItemSeqId} price ${ec.l10n.format(unitAmount, "0.00")} is greater than maximum price ${ec.l10n.format(maxPrice, "0.00")} for product ${orderItem.productId}
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: Item ${orderItem.orderItemSeqId} precio ${ec.l10n.format(unitAmount, "0.00")} es mayor que el precio máximo ${ec.l10n.format(maxPrice, "0.00")} para producto ${orderItem.productId}

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: Item ${orderItem.orderItemSeqId} price ${ec.l10n.format(unitAmount, "0.00")} is greater than ${ec.l10n.format(purchasePricePercent, "0")}% of the lowest sale price ${ec.l10n.format(lowestPrice, "0.00")} for product ${orderItem.productId}
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: Item ${orderItem.orderItemSeqId} precio ${ec.l10n.format(unitAmount, "0.00")} es mayor que ${ec.l10n.format(purchasePricePercent, "0")}% del menor precio de venta ${ec.l10n.format(lowestPrice, "0.00")} para producto ${orderItem.productId}
Moneda de pago ${payment.amountUomId} es diferente a la moneda de la orden ${orderHeader.currencyUomId}

Total prometido o pago total posterior ${ec.l10n.formatCurrency(totalPromised, orderHeader.currencyUomId)} es menor al total de la orden ${ec.l10n.formatCurrency(orderHeader.grandTotal, orderHeader.currencyUomId)}

Total autorizado o pago posterior total ${ec.l10n.formatCurrency(totalAuthorized, orderHeader.currencyUomId)} es menor al total de la orden ${ec.l10n.formatCurrency(orderHeader.grandTotal, orderHeader.currencyUomId)}

Encontrada orden similar ${nearOrder.orderId}:${nearOrder.orderPartSeqId} colocada ${ec.l10n.format(nearOrder.placedDate, null)} (${ec.l10n.format(diffHours, "0.0")}h ${isFuture ? "después" : "antes"}) con ${ec.l10n.format(nearItem.quantity, "0.##")} de producto ${nearItem.productId}
Re-abierto período ${ec.resource.expand('TimePeriodNameTemplate','',timePeriod)}, eliminada${invoiceCount == 1? '': 's'} ${invoiceCount} ${invoiceCount == 1? 'orden': 'órdenes'} de pago

moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.original: Processed pay for period ${ec.resource.expand('TimePeriodNameTemplate','',timePeriod)}: ${employmentList.size()} employees, gross pay total: ${totalPayAmount}, net pay total: ${totalNetPayAmount}
moqui.basic.LocalizedMessage.localized: Procesado pago para período ${ec.resource.expand('TimePeriodNameTemplate','',timePeriod)}: ${employmentList.size()} trabajador${employmentList.size() == 1 ? '': 'es'}, pago total bruto: ${totalPayAmount}, pago total líquido: ${totalNetPayAmount}
${payeeAdjustment.description} para ${partyDetail.firstName?:''} ${partyDetail.lastName?:''}${partyDetail.organizationName?:''} (${partyDetail.partyId})
